div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1110 Zemo-Markhi, Mestia raion, Geor- (1146) gia, 1913 Burial: 3rd cent. B.C. or later Contents: 61 (+2?) AV Alexander III: 60 (+1?) st. Lysimachus: 1 (+1?) st. Disposition: dispersed IAK 52 (1914) Suppl., p. 93 â€ Malakatiia, Vestnik Gosudarstvennogo Muzeia Gruzii 4 (Tiflis, 1928), p. 165 (in Georgian; French summary) Zograph, "Zolotye monety," 28 Pakhomov III, 653 Possibly from the same hd. as nos. 1108 and/or 1109 above
